productFacetNavigation.ariaLabelShowMore: Show more, button, clicking on this button will show all options for the active group
productFacetNavigation.decreaseOptionsVisibility: Options were hidden from the active group, tab backward to read them or forward for the next group
productFacetNavigation.increaseOptionsVisibility: More options were added to the active group, tab backward to read them or forward for the next group
